title: Looking Soviet font.
content:
Hello. I'm looking for the font used on this tank-monument. Doing historical skin for live.warthunder.com. Have friends similar fonts? Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [\_Танк\_Иркутский\_комсомолец\_6[1].JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826154352/http:/typophile.com/files/_%D0%A2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA_%D0%98%D1%80%D0%BA%D1%83%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%81%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%86_6%5B1%5D.JPG) | 1.45 MB |
author: RevanSID

comments.content:
Free cyrillic fonts at this link:

[http://blog.lingualift.com/best-free-cyrillic-fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826154352/http:/blog.lingualift.com/best-free-cyrillic-fonts/ "http://blog.lingualift.com/best-free-cyrillic-fonts/")

Perforama looks like suitable match.
Yeah, I guess that's what I was looking for. Thank you very much.
